articles.author: Stephen Gandel
articles.title: Largest US banks set to log sharp rise in bad loans - Financial Times
articles.description: Earnings are expected to have shrunk in last quarter of 2023 due to unpaid debts and impact of high interest rates
articles.content:
A pile-up of bad debt threatens to sour investors growing optimism about the prospects for the USs largest banks when they report fourth-quarter earnings this week.

articles.title: Carta customers say platform tried to trade their shares without consent - Financial Times

articles.content: Carta, a $7.4bn software company used by start-ups to track their investors, has been trying to trade its customers shares without consent, according to a complaint that threatens to undermine trust … [+3131 chars]
